General.Name: Shenzhen Minglida Precision Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Minglida Precision Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of precision structural parts and molds in China and internationally. It offers precision metal structural parts and precision plastic structural parts; precision die-casting structural parts, including metal shells, brackets, internal support structures, automotive lightweight parts, etc; precision injection molding structural parts; brackets and wire assemblies; and stamping structural parts. The company serves photovoltaic, security, automotive, consumer electronics, communications, aerospace, industrial automation, and other sectors. Shenzhen Minglida Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan, China.
General.Address: Tsinghua Information Port Scientific Research Building, Shenzhen, China, 518108
